description: XSS Challenge 25 endpoint - interactive XSS challenge accepting POST submissions with 'solution' parameter
notes: Challenge endpoint that processes user input via POST with 'solution' parameter. Returns error messages that may reveal server-side processing logic. Form has no CSRF protection. X-XSS-Protection explicitly disabled (value: 0). Accepts GET (displays form) and POST (processes submission). No rate limiting observed. Server-side error message: 'TypeError: Attempting to change the setter of an unconfigurable property' when testing basic input.
